sections.heading: LEASES WITH INDETERMINATE TERMArt
sections.text: 2727. Termination of lease with an indeterminate termA lease with an indeterminate term, including a reconducted lease or a lease whose term has been established through Article 2680, terminates by notice to that effect given to the other party by the party desirin
